member.summary: Specifies the increment for an axis label.

member.summary: Specifies the interval for an axis label.

summary.para: Specifies the types like `Years`, `Months`, `Days`, `Hours`, `Minutes` in date-time axis. They are,

item.description: Defines the interval of the axis in years.
Defines the interval of the axis in months.
Defines the interval of the axis in days.
Defines the interval of the axis in hours.
Defines the interval of the axis in minutes.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.HeatMapCommonAxis.IsInversed
member.summary: Specifies whether the axis to be rendered in the inversed manner or not.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.HeatMapCommonAxis.LabelFormat
member.summary: Used to format the axis label that accepts any global string format like 'C', 'n1', 'P' etc. It also accepts placeholder like '{value}°C' in which value represents the axis label, e.g, 20°C.

summary.para: Specifies the actions like `Rotate45`, `None` and `Trim` when the axis labels intersect with each other. They are,

item.description: Shows all the labels.
Rotates the label to 45 degrees when it intersects.
Trim the label when label text width exceeds the label width.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.HeatMapCommonAxis.LabelRotation
member.summary: Specifies the angle to rotate the axis label.

member.summary: Specifies the maximum range of an axis.

member.summary: Specifies the minimum range of an axis.

member.summary: The `DataSource` provides the data to render the heatmap component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.SfHeatMap`1.Height
member.summary: The height of the HeatMap as a string accepts input as both '100px' or '100%'. If specified as '100%, HeatMap renders to the full height of its parent element.
member.value: Accepts the string value. The default value is 100%.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.SfHeatMap`1.ID
member.summary: Specifies ID property for the heatmap component.
member.value: Accepts the string value. The default value is empty.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.SfHeatMap`1.Theme
member.summary: Specifies the theme for heatmap.
member.value: Accepts a value from the enum. The default value is .

member.summary: Specifies the initial rendering of HeatMap.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.SfHeatMap`1.CssClass
member.summary: The `CssClass` property is used to add a user-preferred class name in the root element of the HeatMap, that can be used to customize the component (both CSS and functionality customization)
member.value: Accepts the CSS class string separated by space to customize the appearance of component.

member.name: P:Syncfusion.Blazor.HeatMap.SfHeatMap`1.Width
member.summary: The width of the HeatMap as a string accepts input as both '100px' or '100%'. If specified as '100%, HeatMap renders to the full width of its parent element.
